Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: Sighting Detailsi was looking out my window at 4 - 4 30 am when i noticed a orange ball or round objet that just appeared from nowhere right at the are i had my attention on it flew in a zig - zagging way one way then dissapeared to later appear coming back ,this time in a straight line then jus dissapeared . i had also seen a bright star like ufo that was on top of where i was for quite some time . i noticed this object (start_like) disk , not making any sound or movement , but i had the feeling something was looking at me from above . then after awhile the object turned of its light and then i noticed it was a a round circle dark bluish no light and was now moving away from the spot it remained for about 45 min . this was 6 years ago . i was in whittier california . thats all i remembered about this one
Summary: it was a orange round objet moving from one side to the other easily
